targets.query: select count( "CpuNum") from (SELECT last("CpuNum") as "CpuNum" FROM $database.."system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
select sum("CpuNum") from (SELECT last("CpuNum") AS "CpuNum" FROM $database.."system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
select sum("MemSize") from (SELECT last("MemSize") as "MemSize" FROM $database.."system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
select sum("DiskSize") from (SELECT last("DiskSize") as "DiskSize" FROM $database.."system" WHERE $timeFilter  GROUP BY "host")
select sum("IndexUsed")/1024 from (SELECT last("IndexUsed") as "IndexUsed" FROM $database.."system" WHERE $timeFilter  GROUP BY "host")
select sum("DiskSize") from (SELECT last("AuxDiskSize") as "DiskSize" FROM $database.."system" WHERE $timeFilter  GROUP BY "host")
select sum("metric")/2  from (SELECT last("SeriesCount") AS "metric" FROM $database.."measurement_metric" WHERE $timeFilter group by "database","measurement")
SELECT last("DBCount") FROM $database.."cluster_metric" WHERE $timeFilter
select count("status") as "StoreStatus" from(SELECT last("StoreStatus") as "status" FROM $database.."system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host") where "status">1

select sum("usage")/count("usage") from (select last("usage") as "usage" from (SELECT mean("CpuUsage") as "usage" FROM $database.."system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m),"host" FILL(null)) group by "host")
select sum("use")/sum("total") from (SELECT last("MemInUse") as "use",  last("MemSize") as "total" FROM $database.."system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
select sum("use")/sum("total") from (SELECT last("DiskUsed") as "use",  last("DiskSize") as "total" FROM $database.."system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
select max("Usage")  from (SELECT last("DiskUsage") as "Usage" FROM $database.."system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
select max("Usage")  from (SELECT last("AuxDiskUsage") as "Usage" FROM $database.."system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
select sum(c) from( select last(FileCount) as c from $database..filestat_level where time>now()-5m group by *)
SELECT last("MstCount") AS "last_MstCount" FROM $database.."cluster_metric" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT mean("CpuUsage") FROM $database.."system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT max("MemUsage") FROM $database.."system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT max("MemInUse") FROM $database.."system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT max("DiskUsage") FROM $database.."system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT max("DiskUsed") FROM $database.."system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT last("StoreStatus") as "store", last("SqlStatus") as "sql",  last("MetaStatus") as "meta" FROM $database.."system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT last("Status") as "status" FROM $database.."metaRaft" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "hostname"
SELECT last("Status") as "status" FROM $database.."meta" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "Host"
